title: I am having trouble downloading league
body: I just got a new laptop and i wanted to download LOL onto it. For some reason this has been proven difficult and i can't install the prerequisite software required to download league.  . . .Now i have no idea what to do. .does anybody know what could be causing this problem?

replies.body: New computers or reformats usually require a windows update to download necessary products.  For your case, I'm assuming the error was due to a Visual C+++ issue.  Updating windows should fix this, but you can also directly download the product [here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).  Hope that helps!
I just did a Windows update and rebooted. Directly downloading the product presents the same error message "error 1935." Not sure what else I can do. :(

Actually after some further digging on another forum site. I found this to be useful:

1. Click Start
2. Search "Run" or click "Run"
3. On Run, search "Msconfig.exe"
4. Click on "Services"
5. Click "Enable All"

I clicked Disable All and then Enable All. 
Rebooted my computer and tried installing again. 
And this ended up working for me. 

Not sure if this will work for OP tho.

I'm having the exact same problem. To be more specific: I get "Error 1935". 

I tried following this old board for a solution (and also every other thing from Google searches) but nothing has worked for me.

[http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/aAz1Q5L8-resolved-help-league-of-legends-wont-install-onto-windows-10](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/aAz1Q5L8-resolved-help-league-of-legends-wont-install-onto-windows-10)
